original_text:
Eye of the Storm
Grande classico delle slot, il tema dell’Antico Egitto non passa mai di moda. D’altronde i misteri e la ricchezza che si porta dietro quest’epoca millenaria ha da sempre suscitato grande interesse verso appassionati di tutto il mondo.
L’esperienza di una slot a tema egizio richiede inevitabilmente una grafica di livello e dobbiamo ammettere che la Reel Kingdom ha fatto un lavoro egregio. Se di solito vengono rappresentati gli interni delle piramidi, qui ci troviamo su un balcone che si affaccia sulla città e da cui è possibile ammirare alcuni palazzi e una piramide. Accanto alla griglia di gioco ci sono due colonne decorate con vari geroglifici tra i quali possiamo riconoscere quelli dedicati al Dio Anubi. Le nuvole all’orizzonte e i fulmini che di tanto in tanto sconquassano il cielo ci sembrano un’ottima trovata per aumentare il pathos.
Completano il comparto grafico una musica incalzante e qualche animazione legata soprattutto alle vincite.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia è una classica 5×3, 10 linee di pagamento fisse, con una puntata minima di 0,10 € e 250 € di massima.
È possibile attivare i giri automatici, compresi alcuni limiti di vincita o di perdita.
Completano il quadro un RTP pari al 96,71% e volatilità alta.
Simboli e funzionalità di Eye of the Storm
Dieci simboli base, quattro di basso valore, sei di alto valore. I primi sono rappresentati dalle tre figure delle carte da gioco più l’asso, i secondi sono quelli a tema Egitto. In ordine di valore, troviamo prima il sole e la chiave della vita, a seguire lo scarabeo dorato, poi la colomba, il ghepardo e infine l’occhio di Ra.
La regina è il simbolo Wild, sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne che lo Scatter e si espande, riempiendo l’intero rullo. Lo Scatter è rappresentato dalla piramide. Oltre a comparire su tutti i rulli e a ricompensare con giri gratuiti, ha anche funzione di moltiplicatore: 3 Scatter raddoppiano la puntata, 4 Scatter ripagano 20x la puntata e con 5 Scatter vedremo la nostra scommessa iniziale moltiplicarsi per 50!
Non è finita qui, perché ai Free Spins è legata una funzione speciale multilivello. Prima di partire con il Bonus, la griglia cambia aspetto, con i 6 simboli di alto valore sistemati in cima ai rulli. Si incomincia con il livello normale e poi in questo modo:

livello 2: tutti i simboli del sole si trasformano nel simbolo chiave della vita
livello 3: Tutte le chiavi della vita diventano scarabei
livello 4: Tutti gli scarabei diventano colombe
livello 5: Tutte le colombe diventano giaguari
livello 5: Tutti i giaguari diventano occhi di Ra

Durante la funzione speciale, per ogni Wild che compare sui rulli verrà aggiunto un ulteriore Free Spin, se invece sui rulli atterreranno 3 o più Scatter, la funzione Giri gratis ripartirà daccapo.

raw_translation.response:
Eye of the Storm
The classic Egyptian theme is never outdated in the world of slots. It’s a well-known fact that the mysteries and riches of this ancient period have always aroused great interest among gambling enthusiasts all over the world.

An Egyptian-themed slot game inevitably requires top-notch graphics, and we must admit that Reel Kingdom has done an excellent job. Instead of the usual depiction of the interiors of pyramids, we find ourselves on a balcony overlooking the city, from which we can admire some palaces and a pyramid. Next to the game grid, there are two columns decorated with various hieroglyphs, among which we can recognize those dedicated to the God Anubis. The clouds on the horizon and the lightning that occasionally disrupts the sky seem like an excellent way to increase the suspense.

The graphical experience is completed by an engrossing soundtrack and a few animations, mainly linked to victories.

Features of the slot
The grid is a classic 5x3, with 10 fixed paylines, a minimum stake of 0.10 € and a maximum of 250 €. It’s possible to activate automatic spins, including some win or loss limits. The slot boasts an RTP of 96.71% and high volatility.

Symbols and features of Eye of the Storm
Ten basic symbols: four low-value and six high-value ones. The first four are represented by the three figures of playing cards, plus the Ace. The remaining six refer to the theme of Egypt. In ascending order of value, we find the sun and the key of life, followed by the golden scarab beetle, then the dove, the cheetah, and finally the Eye of Ra.

The queen is the Wild symbol, replacing all symbols except for the Scatter one and expanding to cover the entire reel. The Scatter is represented by the pyramid. Besides appearing on all reels and rewarding with free spins, it also functions as a multiplier: 3 Scatters double the bet, 4 Scatters repay 20x the bet, and with 5 Scatters, we’ll see our initial wager multiplied by 50!

But that’s not all, as a special multilevel function is linked to Free Spins. Before starting the Bonus, the grid changes appearance, with the six high-value symbols arranged at the top of the reels. We start with the normal level and then progress like this:

level 2: all sun symbols transform into key-of-life symbols
level 3: all key-of-life symbols become scarab beetles
level 4: all scarab beetles become doves
level 5: all doves transform into jaguars
level 6: all jaguars become Eye of Ra symbols

During the special function, an additional Free Spin will be awarded for every Wild that appears on the reels. If 3 or more Scatters land on the reels, the free spins function will start all over again.

Review:
 
Game Overview and Basic Mechanics

Eye of the Storm is an Egyptian-themed slot game developed by Reel Kingdom. The game features a 5x3 grid with 10 fixed paylines, a minimum stake of 0.10 €, and a maximum of 250 €. It boasts an RTP of 96.71% and high volatility. The slot supports automatic spins, including some win or loss limits.

Symbols and Special Features

Eye of the Storm has ten basic symbols, including four low-value ones represented by playing cards' figures and six high-value ones related to the Egyptian theme, such as the Eye of Ra, the scarab beetle, and the dove, among others. The queen is the slot's Wild symbol, replacing all symbols except for the Scatter. The Scatter is represented by the pyramid and appears on all reels, and it also functions as a multiplier. Eye of the Storm features a special multilevel function linked to Free Spins.

Multilevel Function during Free Spins

Before starting the Bonus, the grid changes appearance, with the six high-value symbols arranged at the top of the reels. The multilevel function progresses like this: level 2: all sun symbols transform into key-of-life symbols; level 3: all key-of-life symbols become scarab beetles; level 4: all scarab beetles become doves; level 5: all doves transform into jaguars, and level 6: all jaguars become Eye of Ra symbols. During the special function, an additional Free Spin will be awarded for every Wild that appears on the reels. If 3 or more Scatters land on the reels, the free spins function will start all over again.

RTP and Volatility

Eye of the Storm has an RTP of 96.71%, which is quite decent, and high volatility. Players should be aware that this means that the game can be risky but also rewarding if they manage to land some big wins.

Overall Appeal and Recommendation

Eye of the Storm is a well-designed Egyptian-themed slot game that stands out for its graphics, animations, and soundtrack. It features a classic game grid and ten basic symbols, including a Wild and a Scatter. The multilevel function linked to Free Spins is undoubtedly a highlight of the game, providing players with significant potential winnings. The game's high volatility may not be suitable for casual players, but it's perfect for those looking for more excitement and thrill. Therefore, we recommend Eye of the Storm to fans of Egyptian-themed slots who seek high-risk, high-reward gameplay.

Review: Eye of the Storm
The classic Egyptian theme is never outdated in the world of slots. It’s a well-known fact that the mysteries and riches of this ancient period have always aroused great interest among gambling enthusiasts all over the world.

An Egyptian-themed slot game inevitably requires top-notch graphics, and we must admit that Reel Kingdom has done an excellent job. Instead of the usual depiction of the interiors of pyramids, we find ourselves on a balcony overlooking the city, from which we can admire some palaces and a pyramid. Next to the game grid, there are two columns decorated with various hieroglyphs, among which we can recognize those dedicated to the God Anubis. The clouds on the horizon and the lightning that occasionally disrupts the sky seem like an excellent way to increase the suspense.

The graphical experience is completed by an engrossing soundtrack and a few animations, mainly linked to victories.

Features of the slot
The grid is a classic 5x3, with 10 fixed paylines, a minimum stake of 0.10 € and a maximum of 250 €. It’s possible to activate automatic spins, including some win or loss limits. The slot boasts an RTP of 96.71% and high volatility.

Symbols and features of Eye of the Storm
Ten basic symbols: four low-value and six high-value ones. The first four are represented by the three figures of playing cards, plus the Ace. The remaining six refer to the theme of Egypt. In ascending order of value, we find the sun and the key of life, followed by the golden scarab beetle, then the dove, the cheetah, and finally the Eye of Ra.

The queen is the Wild symbol, replacing all symbols except for the Scatter one and expanding to cover the entire reel. The Scatter is represented by the pyramid. Besides appearing on all reels and rewarding with free spins, it also functions as a multiplier: 3 Scatters double the bet, 4 Scatters repay 20x the bet, and with 5 Scatters, we’ll see our initial wager multiplied by 50!

But that’s not all, as a special multilevel function is linked to Free Spins. Before starting the Bonus, the grid changes appearance, with the six high-value symbols arranged at the top of the reels. We start with the normal level and then progress like this:

level 2: all sun symbols transform into key-of-life symbols
level 3: all key-of-life symbols become scarab beetles
level 4: all scarab beetles become doves
level 5: all doves transform into jaguars
level 6: all jaguars become Eye of Ra symbols

During the special function, an additional Free Spin will be awarded for every Wild that appears on the reels. If 3 or more Scatters land on the reels, the free spins function will start all over again.
